title: The Price of Recognition

panel_structure.description: The Architect reaching toward the gremlin, fingers delicately approaching to take a single hair—an intimate gesture of understanding
Close-up of the single hair being held, glowing with potential—all the versions of self that will never be, now that recognition has occurred

transformation_notes: The tender act of taking a single hair becomes a metaphor for how being understood by another both connects us and limits our ability to remain mysterious, even to ourselves.
